ratings.comment: Great professor and a great course! Gina's lectures were interesting. The course was very easy to get an A. There were quizzes once a week which were very easy if you attended lecture. There were a few short papers throughout the semester, no exams. The class was very focused on LEARNING rather than scoring high on exams which was so refreshing.
I love Gina!!! She is so funny and really cares about her students. This class is not very hard but I know that she is graduating and probably won't be teaching it again

Gina was hilarious and gave great lectures. She used TopHat for attendance and questions throughout lecture. There are weekly quizzes but slides were always posted online. Overall, was an easy class for 4 credits! She was a personable and great teacher-- highly recommend!

Every day I looked forward to coming to Professor Longo's Social Psych class. I always felt inspired and excited, and after taking this class I know more about myself. She was extremely knowledgeable about the material and could give relevant examples for nearly every concept. Excellent lecturing skills that had me interested the whole time :)

Participation does not count for lecture but does count for discussion. She is a nice lady but a lot of material on the lecture slides is taken directly out of the textbook. Graded based off of two easy exams and a 10pg paper, easy A.  The class has a very liberal viewpoint and those with conservative viewpoints are not accepted.

Great professor who really cares about the material she teaches. Just know that if you're taking social psychology it's glorified anthropology in the sense that political correctness and professors views are very clear. If you just accept that it's a great class and an easy A.

Prof. Longo was awesome! Although the material was dry, she made it interesting with lots of stories from her life that were relatable and funny! She is one of the most caring/genuine professors I have had thus far. She gives a study guide word for word of whats on the exam so you know exactly what to study. I did not do any readings and I was fine

Mrs. Longo is a great professor for Psych. She's very passionate about what she teaches and is very relatable. Lectures are just reviews of what is being read in the book, but you'll need to go to discussion and a few lectures for participation points. Great class overall.

I have had professor Longo for two classes now. She is so funny and she uses awesome examples to help me remember the material. She does have a hard paper but she breaks it in two assignments. She really cares about her students. She met with me a lot and was always helpful.  I would take her again for sure.

Lectures tended to be long and boring and seemingly unnecessary but Gina's personal stories were quite hilarious and made class bearable.  I almost never opened the book except before the midterms.  Professor Longo is extremely helpful and is there for all their students.  Would definitely take again!

Gina is very funny and cares a lot about her students. Class is definitely not mandatory as long as you read through the lecture slides. The study guides she gives us are word for word the exam, so do those and you will do fine.

I loved Gina she always made class really interesting and easy to come to first thing in the morning. The research paper is geared towards freshman, so it's explained really well and spaced out throughout the semester. Definitely would take a class with her again.

I took this class, second semester sophomore year and loved her! Such a great, caring, funny teacher and the class is an easy A if you put in a little work! Only issue is that she is very clear about her political agenda, but even as a conservative person, I still really enjoyed her lectures and liked learning about why she has her opinions.

I took this class as a second semester sophomore, and I had never met a professor that cared more about her students than Professor Longo. She genuinely cares about the success of her students in and out of her classroom. The class itself is really interesting too. 2 midterms, 1 final, 1 paper. Exams are very clearly based off the study guides.

Professor Longo was a wonderful professor. She really looks to help students in any way she can, and wants everyone to do well in her course. The tests are LITERALLY material straight of the review sheets, so if you do them its an easy A. One 10 page paper, but she is so helpful and grading on it isn't harsh. Highly recommend this soc class.

Longo is funny. She uses a lot of personal examples in class. The midterms as VERY EASY if you know the study guide. There is one ten page paper, but you have all semester to do it. Overall a great professor who is ALWAYS willing to help. Attendance not needed to pass, but she takes attendance daily. I never opened the textbook - don't buy it.

Professor Longo was the nicest and most helpful professor I have ever had! She is also hilarious. She cares so much about her students and her kindness is infectious. The material is interesting and she is willing to help you with absolutely anything. She really made my first term paper a breeze.
